attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have currently been working in the Civil Service for 16 years.  Could you please tell me why people have been employed to do the same job as me and are at the same grade, have been put on a Higher Spine Point?  Two years ago we had 4 new members of staff (men and women) who joined our department at the same grade as me doing the same job and the lowest paid new member of staff was on £3000 more than me, even though I have 14 years service at the time and I more qualified than they are.  Is this not against the equal pay act?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
